overview: When a devious plot separates CIA agent Peter Sandza from his son, Robin, the distraught father manages to see through the ruse. Taken because of his psychic abilities, Robin is being held by Ben Childress, who is studying people with supernatural powers in hopes of developing their talents as weapons. Soon Peter pairs up with Gillian, a teen who has telekinesis, to find and rescue Robin.
tagline: An experience in terror and suspense.
cast: Kirk Douglas|John Cassavetes|Amy Irving|Carrie Snodgress|Charles Durning
